achievements.name: "Polychrome Tri-Stars"
achievements.desc: Defeat Local Legend: Polychrome Tri-Stars.

achievements.name: "Polychrome Tri-Stars"
achievements.desc: Defeat Vasily first, then defeat the other members of the Polychrome Tri-Stars.

achievements.name: "Polychrome Tri-Stars"
achievements.desc: Defeat the Polychrome Tri-Stars within 10s of defeating the first member.

achievements.name: "Cocijo"
achievements.desc: Defeat Local Legend: Cocijo.

achievements.name: "Cocijo"
achievements.desc: Defeat Cocijo before he forms a Thunderthorn Ward.

achievements.name: "Cocijo"
achievements.desc: Defeat Cocijo after the Thunderthorn Ward has been formed, and without any character having been hit by the Ward's reflected attacks.

achievements.name: "Sappho Amidst the Waves"
achievements.desc: Defeat Local Legend: Sappho Amidst the Waves.

achievements.name: "Sappho Amidst the Waves"
achievements.desc: Defeat Sappho Amidst the Waves without being hit by her Shattering Ice attacks.

achievements.name: "Sappho Amidst the Waves"
achievements.desc: Defeat Sappho Amidst the Waves without allowing any of the Cryo spray cans to explode.

achievements.name: "Balachko"
achievements.desc: Defeat Local Legend: Balachko.

achievements.name: "Balachko"
achievements.desc: During the course of completing a single challenge, defeat no targets besides the original body while Balachko is using Shadowblade Tactics.

achievements.name: "Balachko"
achievements.desc: During the course of completing a single challenge, defeat 3 copies in a row before Balachko can unleash Shadowblade Tactics.

achievements.name: "Cihuacoatl of Chimeric Bone"
achievements.desc: Defeat Local Legend: Cihuacoatl of Chimeric Bone.

achievements.name: "Cihuacoatl of Chimeric Bone"
achievements.desc: During the course of completing a single challenge, break all the grappling anchor points before the Cihuacoatl of Chimeric Bone goes into the hovering state.

achievements.name: "Cihuacoatl of Chimeric Bone"
achievements.desc: Defeat the Cihuacoatl of Chimeric Bone while she is in the hovering state.

achievements.name: "He Never Dies"
achievements.desc: Defeat Local Legend: He Never Dies.

achievements.name: "He Never Dies"
achievements.desc: Defeat "He Never Dies" without being hit by "Ultimate Technique: Giant Undying Collision."

achievements.name: "He Never Dies"
achievements.desc: Defeat "He Never Dies" after interrupting the charging of "Ultimate Technique: Giant Undying Collision" 3 times.

achievements.name: "Tlatzacuilotl"
achievements.desc: Defeat Local Legend: Tlatzacuilotl.

achievements.name: "Tlatzacuilotl"
achievements.desc: During the course of completing a single challenge, break Tlatzacuilotl's Ward each time with a single attack.

achievements.name: "Tlatzacuilotl"
achievements.desc: Defeat Tlatzacuilotl without being hit by any attacks.

achievements.name: "Ichcahuipilli's Aegis"
achievements.desc: Defeat Local Legend: Ichcahuipilli's Aegis.

achievements.name: "Ichcahuipilli's Aegis"
achievements.desc: During the course of completing a single challenge, defeat 10 Nightsoul Warriors during the Trial of Decisions.

achievements.name: "Ichcahuipilli's Aegis"
achievements.desc: Defeat Ichcahuipilli's Aegis without being hit by any attacks.

achievements.name: "Chimalli's Shade"
achievements.desc: Defeat Local Legend: Chimalli's Shade.

achievements.name: "Chimalli's Shade"
achievements.desc: Defeat Chimalli's Shade without any characters being downed.

achievements.name: "Chimalli's Shade"
achievements.desc: During the course of completing a single challenge, when Chimalli's Shade absorbs "Hydroflow Constructs," break her Elemental Ward by launching frozen "Hydroflow Constructs."

achievements.name: "Atlatl's Blessing"
achievements.desc: Defeat Local Legend: Atlatl's Blessing.

achievements.name: "Atlatl's Blessing"
achievements.desc: During the course of completing a single challenge, use Parry to counterattack all of Atlatl's Blessing's power attacks and inflict damage.

achievements.name: "Atlatl's Blessing"
achievements.desc: Defeat Atlatl's Blessing without taking any damage from attacks.
